text: Cythara anthera is an extinct species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Mangeliidae.Worldwide Mollusk Species Data Base: Cythara anthera This species is considered a nomen dubium. ==Description== ==Distribution== This extinct marine species was found in Miocene strata of the Alum Bluff Formation in Florida, USA. ==References== ==External links== * Smithsonian Institution: Cythara anthera anthera Category:Gastropods described in 1937
title: Cythara anthera
